content.detailedDescription: I was at my mothers house staying with her because her father recently passed away.  we were packing that evening getting ready to drive back to colorado.  my mom lives in the u.P. of michigan on little bay de noc, a horseshoe shaped bay.  you can see the other side, which is a peninsula straight across. my dog was whining to go outside, so i opened the sliding glass door to let him out. the sliding glass door is on the lake side from the door to the lake is about 600 feet or more.  the back yard from the house is flat then drops off down a hill then the shore line begins. there are not many trees looking straight out the back, but to the right the trees are thicker, so there is a pretty clean view straight out the back of her house. so, i went outside with my dog, it was a very cold evening.  my dog wanted to come back inside right away, so i kept saying," come on go potty".  as i was motioning him to go out into the yard, i notice a (boat) on the lake. i thought it was very strange for someone to be out fishing on such a cold, cold night, but not unheard of right? especially in michigan. i looked at it again and noticed it did not have a light on the front or rear, it had a light blue line than was angled slightly, the back being higher than the front.  i thought to myself that someone tricked out their boat with rope lights. all of a sudden it took off speeding, but i did not hear any noise.  it is very easy to hear noise on the lake because of the way the bay is shaped like a horseshoe.  i slapped my face a couple times, blinked my eyes, thinking what the heck is that.  then the light stopped again, then it took off at lighting speed again without a sound, it continued stopping and speeding about 3 times with no hint of sound.  it was going from left to right, so i just stood on the deck watching and listening, until it hit the area of trees on the right. the moon was almost full so the light was shining down on the water.  as i continued to watch, i lost site at the trees, but waited to see if it would continue toward the moon light on the bay, but i did not see it again.  my dog was already in the house, for some reason, he did not want to be outside, and i felt uncomfortable not having him outside with me. i was afraid to go to the edge of the hill and watch more closely. i stood at the sliding door watching for about 5 more minutes, but nothing. i went back into the house and grabbed mom's room-mate and told him what i saw, so we stood outside for 10 to 15 minutes longer and never saw the light again. throughout the evening, i would open the sliding glass door and look at the bay, i did here weird noises in the woods after the siting.  it freaked me out, so i went back into the house.  i had a very creepy feeling the rest of the night along with sleep loss.  this is the 2nd siting that i have seen over the bay, the 1st time was back in 1980.  for some reason i wasn't as creeped out over this siting, as i was with the one i saw in 1980.
content.summary: Saw a light blue line on top of the water moving very fast then stopping.

content.detailedDescription:
Photographs were taken in march of a low-flying craft resembling a b2-bomber, but which possessed the abilities to stay in relatively the same place, invert itself, rotate and seemingly just sit on the wind.

southern california at this time was covered in dark, gray skies.  the object appeared through the cloud formations and appeared not to move for prolonged periods of time.

after approximately twenty minutes, in seemed to recede farther in the distance until completely enveloped by the clouds.

when seen moving, the craft sailed upon a straight trajectory (indicating intelligently-controlled) and also arced high and behind the tree seen in the photograph.

as the form allows only 3 photographs to be uploaded at a time, please check the following reports which will carry the rest of them.  there are 13 in total - some the original shot - others a maximized, zoomed in version indicated by their title.
content.summary: Photographed black triangle in stormy skies - part vi (final)

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv near my window. i was layed in the bed, every night i do that, i can see airplanes passing through the window. ive saw many planes passing, so i was used to see them passing.

last night, i was watching tv and i saw a light passing through, i thought it was an airplane, but then i saw like an orange like and then i supossed it wasnt an airplane. i saw the object carefully and i noted that it had like 9 lights turning around the object  and the entire ufo was moving faster than a plane. i saw the ufo descending and waited it for raise again but nothing. 

i took my handycam and recorded some of the ufos that were passing in the next minutes, they were at a far distance, so i had to use the digital zoom of the camera.

i lose the sight of the object because the houses in the far hide the ufo's.
content.summary: 12 ufo's globe-shape with lights

content.detailedDescription: My son called me to come outside last night to see something.  when i went out he pointed to a star like object that was moving slightly to the right and then to the left and slowly up higher.  he ask if he was seeing things or was it actually hovering and moving from side to side.  i confirmed this as i was witnessing the same thing.  it was located north east.  we watched for a few minutes and he went in the house.  a couple minutes later another one of these star like objects appeared south east.  i watched as it did the same thing as the first.  my son came back out and observed both of these objects with me.  we looked through night vision binoculars and saw the movement and the colors were red, blue and green.  as we were watching airplanes started coming in the direction of the objects and probably in a 15-20 minute period there were over 15 planes in the same path.  seemed strange for planes to be coming in that path and so many as if they were checking them out also.
content.summary: Two star like ufo

content.detailedDescription:
From satillite data it has been found that nasa has captured human life on mars with images of people, transportation,tructures, houses and animals.

this is a must see live broadcast for everone. don't miss it

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=bdo4zbcmc0s
content.summary: Nasa photographs human life on mars satillite images full disclosure taking place now!

content.detailedDescription: One week after the fourth of july, lots of explosions....Thought it was another fireworks display over cass lake but fireworks were not visible as they usally can be seen over the trees.  i was glad when the booms stopped.....Not a fireworks fan.  i was online or watching tv near a window when i saw what appeard to be sparklers......It was like looking at a campfire through the trees........Tree leaves blocked most of the light so it appeard to be some kind of sparkler or fireworks, but all noise had stopped before the sparkling appeard.  the sparkles rose higher in the trees, and a growing bubble of orange light through and over the trees.....(pardon grammatical errors, trying to be coherent and accurate here)..The light was like the light from a fire that was growing rapidly.....Almost like the initial round, glowing, and growing explosion of a nuke weapon but no smoke, and again...No sound.  then the thing appeared above the tree line.........Three bright orange headlights/floodlights. the lights were distintly kept from illuminating upward.  the whole neighborhood was lit up from the thing.  it slowly ascended then turned eastward......Approx 100 feet off the ground before it started turning eastward and it continued to rise to maybe one thousand feet as it moved eastward, speed also seemed to increase steadily.  i could not make out the shape of the objett, but it appeared to have  lighted windows on the back side as it moved away.  i estimated the size according to the span of the crown of the trees it rose above when i first saw it.  that's all.....No lights pointed directly at me, no abduction, just sooooo weird because the thing was silent and the lights were so broad and oddly colored orange......Maybe a little less orange than flames of fire, but very close......When i saw a campfire through the woods once after the inc3ident, i pointed it out to a friend as it loooked very similar to the lights of the strange craft when i first saw it.   when i first saw it i thought it was a helicopter, but it was silent.  then i thought it must be a balloon or blimp, but it seemed to move too fast as it headed east.  i was quite awestuck and a little scared, but the thing had no notice or interest in me which i was glad for. the thing disappeared in the distance after moving a mile or two in less than one minute, too fast for a blimp. the object must have been about twenty feet in height(estimating by the size of the headlights/floodlights,  and fifty feet wide.  the wooded area is behind a school.  i did not examine the area...Yet...For signs on the ground.  people think i"m crazy anyways.....If i find nothing there, that's just more reason to think i'm crazy.  didn't bother to look, i know what i saw.
content.summary: Three bright orange headlights/floodlights, approx 50 feet wide, silent., ascended out of woods, extremely bright lights illuminated a quarter mile circle before rising and then heading east.

content.detailedDescription: At 7:00 a.M. while getting newspaper from mail box, something caught my attention to my right. looking to the northeast, through the nearly bare trees i saw two bright lights on top of an object. it appeared to be cigar shaped. moving very fast to the north west.As it was still dark the object was not very vivid, though the lights were bright.It appeared to be closer than a mile away. absolutely no sound.Lasting only a few seconds. it apperaed to be very large. hard to tell size with no reference points. i checked time after siting and it was 7:01 to 7:03. lost sight of it as it flew away as it was very fast.    when i first saw it i thought i was seeing something unreal because there was no sound. i told my wife i think i saw a ufo. i was still processing what i had seen.
content.summary: Two bright lights with other lights around outside edge

content.detailedDescription: On the date of event, i was at a shope , my fried- ramesh dangar called me on cellphone and asked to say about an flying object. then i went to terrace of my home and observed the object. it was about 5 km away from us. the object was like a missile moving from west to the north-west(left to right) slowly at height of 5 degree visualy. the color of whole object was orange. my friend said that it was about 6-8 degree long visualy at starting and it was getting short, when i show it(after 2 minutes), it was about 2 arc degree long visualy. there is an airport at north-west from my home, but i don't think that it was any aeroplane. 5 persons(with me) wathed that object. that object was slowly disapearing and then totaly disapeared in sky. ramesh has watched this event for about 4 minutes.
content.summary: A light like orange colored object was moving

content.detailedDescription: On the date of event, i was at a shope , my fried- ramesh dangar called me on cellphone and asked to say about an flying object. then i went to terrace of my home and observed the object. it was about 5 km away from us. the object was like a missile moving from west to the north-west(left to right) slowly at height of 5 degree visualy. the color of whole object was orange. my friend said that it was about 6-8 degree long visualy at starting and it was getting short, when i show it(after 2 minutes), it was about 2 arc degree long visualy. there is an airport at north-west from my home, but i don't think that it was any aeroplane. 5 persons(with me) wathed that object. that object was slowly disapearing and then totaly disapeared in sky. ramesh has watched this event for about 4 minutes.
content.summary: An orange colored object was moving

content.detailedDescription:
Saw two disk crafts flying overhead while riding my bicycle.  crafts made no noise and displayed no lights.  they were flying in evening aprox. 800 ft overhead.  i have pilots license and know heights.  the sun was setting and the crafts were visible in evening light.    they were circular and made no noise, odd since they were so close to me. they were flying very close together for formation flying.  

next encounter (different day) i was focusing the video camera on a planet (so i thought).  i was setting up the camera���s f-stop for night photography incase i got another view of these objects.  i thought i was focusing on a planet.  the planet/object was bright and round. there was a faint shadow of a rim or something around the light.  i wasn���t sure of what i was seeing.  the object suddenly accelerated and shot threw the sky and made a hard turn, not like anything we have.  nothing moves like that in the sky.  it flew away for some distance real fast then quickly slowed down and stopped. it turned again went down a little, then the light split in two and the object disappeared.  

next encounter (different night) object hovering in same place again.  now i���m checking the night sky regularly.  i ran into house to get strobe light to flash object for attention.  two fighter jets approached by the time i came out of the house.  the item increased distance between itself and the jets.  two more lights suddenly appeared and all three lights appeared to play with the jets.  the jets and lights went over horizon.  

next encounter (different night) light slightly higher and at different location in sky.  by now i have memorized every bright looking planet in the sky.  if a light appears out of place i watch it with a powerful telescope.  i watch the sky around 20:00 hrs.  i ran in and got my strobe.  the light began to leave slowly.  i flashed the strobe and the light reversed direction, and backed up in my direction, stopped again then departed extremely fast.  

next encounter unsure.  during overcast air force back again in same area.  air force never fly���s over my house.  i documented the dates and times in my day planner.  i can make them available to you if you want.  

objects did not return as of late.  are these things dangerous?  i managed to get them to take a closer look at me by a combination of light signals.  i do not want to be known.  i want to be safe.  if this is not safe i am done.  thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two craft flying tandem.  one craft hovering.  several encounters.

content.detailedDescription:
I came home & stopped in the driveway & got out of the car & retrieved the newspaper from the box.  i got back in the car and started pulling toward the garage when i looked up into the sky toward the north and noticed several orange globes of light mostly in a staight line moving from north to southwest.  i shut off the car and got out to observe better.  i walked out of the light of the garage into the darker area west of the garage and noticed more lights appearing from the north.  there were about 4 that seemed bunched up and then they aligned into a straight line and moved toward the west where, one by one, they just disappeared.  in all there were about 10.  there was no sound to them.  i could hear the announcer at the high school football field, but there was no other sound.  i observed that there was no wind and the moon was slightly obscured by clouds to the south & east of the driveway. i ran to the door of the house and called to my husband, but he did not hear me as he was in the basement and i did not want to lose sight of the globes so i did not go & get him. it took about 5 minutes for this to finish.  there was no mention on the 11:00 pm news and no reports on the internet. i regret that i did not have my camera, as my husband, mother and brother do not believe me.

can you please tell me what they were?
content.summary: 10 orange globes of light flying from north to west with no sound & then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
After leaving kartchner caverns in benson, arizona i was taking scenic pictures of the mountains on the way home using my fuji 70exr 10 megapixel digital camera. i took them out the passenger side window with the window down. it was approximately 1-2pm. upon getting back to the resort i looked at the pictures and saw this object in one of the photos. i hadn't noticed it when i took the photo. the photo shows a hazy whitish oval with a slighty purple rim that appears to be infront of the mountain and in between me and the mountain. not sure what it is but thought i'd submit this incase someone else in the area had an experience. 

also i should mention the previous day while visiting coronado national park at roughly the same time, i saw in the sky a highly reflective or brightly illuminated object slowing moving north. it did not look like a plane. i watched it for several seconds and then it completely disappeared out of a clear blue sky. i got out of the car to look for it and took photos of the sky, and it was nowhere to be seen nor did it appear on any photos. fellow guests back at our resort the eplendor in rio rico also reported seeing a similar object that was visible for approximately 15 seconds around 7pm the same evening, also moving north.  

i should add that i have a masters degree in astronomy from swinburne university and am an usaf vet. neither object was venus!
content.summary: Oval hazy object near mountain.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my computer and looked out the window. i saw what looked like 2 lights flying next to each other. i went to the front door and looked out to see what looked like 3 bright round lights flying in a triangle formation. i called for my dad and mom to look at it. my mom came out first and saw it too. then my dad came out and right away said it was one of those triangle ufo's we here about. he then went in the house and came back out to the front with his night vision camera that is attached to a camcorder. my dad filmed the ufo. i got some binoculars from the house and looked at it closer, but by that time it was moving away from us. what i saw was 2 bright white lights in the front, 2 blinking lights in the middle(1 red and 1 white), then 3 bright white lights in the back. i couldn't tell for sure but there might of been a tail of an airplane in the back. when i watched the video my dad filmed, it did not look like a airplane though and we did not hear any jet or airplane sounds at all. it was below the clouds so i would think it would of made a sound if it was. we watched the object from our front porch facing east at first, then the object turned toward the west where we lost it in the trees to the north of us. the object flew from the south to the north then west. the sighting lasted about a minute and a half.
content.summary: 3 white lights in a trangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
Gentlemen:

i live on lake ontario and for the past year have been filming many ufo events on the lake. i have invited witnesses to do our ufo night watching and have on my video camera 60-70 strange encounters. i have multiple orange shaped intelligent flying objects flying over lake, i have white orbs appearing and flying towards my house. i have seen 2 huge ships. the first time was  a very large almost giant diamon shaped ship traveling at a high rate of speed spinning with red, white lights among other lights and the ship was spinning rapidly. i have seen lights that look like stars at first glow very bright and suddenly dart in close to my home. i have used things such as very bright glowing lamps in total darkness which seems to almost attract them, i have used lasers and i am successfull at attracting them about 50% of the times that i have tried. i have on tape a strange object come up from the lake and appear about 50 feet in front of me and a group of witnesses just this past may. this happened while i was filming a white orb coming toward us, and suddenly a splash from the lake and this object came up people within the group started to run away (this is all documented on my camera) i live approximately 1/2 mile from guinea nuclear plant and since there is a restrictive no fly zone the triangel red blinking objects are here frequently. i began noticing these objects while sitting on my dock watching sunset and i saw a silver like cylinder shaped flying around, this is what started my fascination, my neighbors can attest to many of the things i have stated here and i actually believe that i can attract these crafts using some of the methods i have developed that seem to get their attention and since i now have so many documented events and over 20 people who have been invited and have witnessed these strange events, i believe u can gather evidence here that may prove it once and for all. i should tell you that on more than one occasion myself and the people i was with did feel threatened and the ufos did seem aggresive , but for the most part they seem to go away quickly when they feel like it. i am very close to actually making my own documentary footage and inviting people thru ads so i have differnet peopls real live accounts on tape, i would like to keep my footage to myself right now but will provide it to you if you would like to investigate these multiple sightings.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Triangle
content.summary: Orange, white lights triangle shaped and also diamond shaped with red lights

content.detailedDescription: I was going to a friend's house about 3 miles from my home. i was just about there, coming to a major city intersection where i would take a right. a few minutes earlier i'd already noticed a bright single white oval light coming towards me from my left, lower in the sky, but it seemed probably a commercial airliner. when it got closer, it showed a green navigation light on a wing with bright landing lights, or so it then seemed. but, when it crossed behind some trees, the navigation light had become white! at this point it was just about in front of me, just to the left. as the craft continued to move east from right to left across my field of vision, directly over the road in front of me, it slowly tilted up its bottom towards my direction showing a perfect isosceles triangle of white lights with a single red blinking light, with a small red "halo" around it, in the middle. the craft continued to move slowly, then slowly rotated its bottom back down again while also starting a slow bank towards the north. at that point all three white lights started to blink. the car in front of me literally stopped in road after turning just slightly towards where the craft was banking away. i had to stop my car to avoid hitting him, and pulled around him while the craft was lost from sight behind some trees. i've filed this report because i feel bad that i didn't stop also, as i'm ninety-nine and forty-four one hundredths percent sure that he also saw what i did and was astonished at what he was seeing. i guess he was hoping that i or someone would stop too to verify with him what he saw. i'm sure there are are other people that could have seen this large object fly over st. louis too, so i'm reporting this should anybody be looking for such verification. i've created an image of the exact location but for it being a cloudy day instead of a cloudy night: the craft was "painted" in to show a facsimile of what was seen at one point that night.
content.summary: Large triangle traversing st. louis.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were attending a "pig-picking" outdoor roast at my friend's home off of hwy 96. we were asked to drive to a local quick-mart to pick up several needed items. went to the store, then turned onto hwy 96 coming back. a glint caught my eye in the car, so i looked. there was a vehicle slowly rising from a hill @ a third of a mile to my right. i asked my wife, cindy, if she saw it and she said yes. we pulled onto the shoulder and stopped. we didn't have a camera! the vehicle's base was an upside-down saucer with a round "turret" on top. it slowly rose from the hill, hovered, then accelerated at amazing speed angling upwards, but doing so in a zig-zag pattern until it disappeared into high altitude clouds a good 3 miles down hwy 96. we returned to the festivities and i decided to tell the proprietor of the party what we saw. he poo-pood it, so we decided not to mention it to anyone else. i forgot to mention that the entire surface of the vehicle looked like polished aluminum.
content.summary: Saw object slowly rise from hill, then zig-zag at high speed away

content.detailedDescription: i am sure i seen this craft from my home for over an hour. it was sitting over a field by interstate 70 approximately 1 1/2 miles east of greenville. i thought it was lit up like a large billboard. lights would be on, occasionally they were off. i didn't report it for other reasons that i may explain to someone that wont think me a fool. maybe i've had a few other experiences i'm afraid to say or iv'e just lost my mind. i know if i see anything about ufo;s anywhere i have to watch! don't know who to talk to but i wish i knew if anything happened or i'm just imagining these years for nothing.  (please keep this anonomys) please you can contact me e-mail first if you need to.
content.summary: Saw ufo over illinois on dicovery, did a little reasearch and found there was missing time in flight path i can help fill in a gap

content.detailedDescription: I was talking with a neighbor outside. i was glancing at the sky occasionally as i usually do. i noticed what appeared to be an airplane coming in my direction from the west. i decided to see which airplane it was. my father was an air traffic controller and always looked at the sky and would identify planes. as it approached it was becoming bigger and brighter where i thought it was going to crash as it seemed to be so low. i also noted that there was no flashing lights to identify it as a plane. it made no sound as it flew overhead and continued across the sky slowly. i was very bright. it began to go more southwest and at some point changed color to a golden color. the neighbor and i were both speachless. i was laughing because to me it was something i could not explain. i watched it until it went out of view. we did not even remember what we were talking about because it was so strange to experience what we saw. the following month i attended the astronomy club meeting and asked about what i saw. i was told that it had to be an iridium satellite. i did not report it anywhere else at the time because i took what they said for the explanation.
content.summary: Irridium flare or ufo

content.detailedDescription: I have always been completely fascinated by the sky in all it's celestial wonder. not because of the many infinite and unexplained phenomena and mysteries that it beholds but because in my opinion it is the most beautiful form of live art.This is where i most vehemently see and feel god...In nature. the clouds, the sunsets, sunrises, everything about the sky completely enthralls and captivates me. i am a very scientific person and also a very, very spiritual person. i am skeptical about things such as ufo's, ghosts, spirits, aliens, and anything that i cannot see or feel for myself. i have always said, it's not that i don't believe, i am very open minded but i need to see things like this for myself in order to truly believe. this is why this occasion just leaves me speechless. i don't know how to explain what i saw. but i saw it. my fiance and i were driving from our place to visit our parents near stafford driving down beltway 8 south and approaching the gessner exit when i was merely looking out of my fiance's window up at the clouds in the sky. he was driving, i was in the passenger seat. the sun was setting at the time so it was still bright out but not so bright that a very brilliant light in the sky could've been overlooked. that is exactly what i saw. i saw a round, incredibly bright, bright light that seemed to be moving with the car. i knew right away it wasn't a plane or any other type of machine of that nature. i just felt that it was something....Different....Something i couldn't quite put my finger on. it was ....It just was. it wasn't the typical ufo sighting i've heard about or even the kind we see in movies. there was no actual tangible object i was looking at. it was just a very bright light. and i would've not been the least bit suspicious of said light except that i asked my fiance if he could see it too. so he turned his head in that direction and was able to witness it as well but only for a few seconds as he had to concentrate on the road. so i continued to stare at it, and it seemed almost immediately after i mentioned it to my fiance and he saw it, well, this is what happened next. as i stared at the light it seemed to get bigger and brighter and then it seemed to be moving away rapidly because it got smaller, then smaller, then just zoomed away instantaneously and disappeared. i watched the whole thing happen right before my eyes. i was the president of the astronomy club in college, i know what stars look like, what planets look like, i can tell you almost every single celestial phenomena involving clouds and actual scientific celestial things i can tell you what the airplane towers look like, i have never in my entire life seen anything like this!!! i know i didn't imagine it although sometimes i wonder if it would be better to believe that. i don't know to explain what i saw or even try to make sense of it, all i know is that i saw something. i don't know why, but i did. and i have to be honest, although i have no clue what it was it's not something one can easily forget. it gave me a whole new perspective on the place i already called home and couldn't wait to get back to, the stars, the world above and beyond us. i've always thought this universe and it's infinite vastness was just too big for us to be alone but what i saw that night, well maybe it's just a little firmer tug on my heartstrings. maybe it was just the confirmation i needed.
content.summary: I watched it appear and disappear right before my very eyes!!!

content.detailedDescription: We were living temporarily at the thunderbird motel in ne okc right on hwy 66. we were watching an overhead funnel cloud as the funnel kept dipping down slightly, bobbing up and down. suddenly a spherical object came below the cloud level, as if it was studying the funnel cloud. it was @ 100ft in diameter, with lighted panels,about6'high by 10' long,flashing in an ac chaser-like sequence counter-clockwise. the peculiar thing was that it would flash a different color at each panel succesion, but the same panel would flash different colors. it simply drifted alongside the cloud, and i could see mechanical arms that were retracted as if they were landing gear. i only saw two, so i assume there was a third that didn't face our direction. there was no sound! it finally just rose back into the cloud. i counted how many of us saw that, and, including myself, there were exactly 30 of us. we discussed whether we should call authorities about it, and decided they'd think we were crazy, so we didn't. after moving to tn another event happened 8-27-94 that was completely different, so i'll call this website back to tell you what happened that time. jim
content.summary: Vehicle descends next to funnel cloud

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were heading towards pavilion, ny from batavia, ny on route 63 on october 26, 2009. it was very dark out and about 8:15pm when we saw an object with 5 large white lights and 1 small red blinking light hovering low above the road in the distance ahead. coming from batavia we thought it was a radio tower or airplane or something of that nature. as we neared it we noticed it was some type of aircraft. we both were pretty calm at first because neither my husband or i believed in ufo's. as we drove directly under this object we both became extremely nervous. i didn't know what to make of what i just saw, my husband couldn't even speak. i know we were not the only ones who saw it because there were several cars in front of us an behind us. the cars in front of us were pulling off to the side of the road to look at it and other cars were swerving in their lane trying to look at the object. the object would not move. we opened our windows but no noise was present. after we drove a little ways up the road the object disappeared without a trace. when we arrived home about 7 minutes later, we stepped out of our car and the air smelled different, kind of like ozone or something like that. then, a half hour later, my husband stepped out onto the deck for his last cigarette of the evening and looked up at the sky because he heard a noise. he then knocked on the window for my brother and i to come outside. there was an odd humming noise unlike an airplane in the sky. we looked up and i saw an aircraft that looked like a square on top of a rectangle though my husband said it reminded him of the shape of an arrowhead sort of but without a point on the end. it was moving sideways. we watched until it disappeared once again.

later, about 3am that morning we were awoken by the odd humming again. we looked out the windows but saw nothing. however, there was an unfamiliar high pitched noise coming from the corn field behind our house. lasted about 15 minutes then just stopped. did not get much sleep that night because we were already a little shaken by what we had already seen.
content.summary: Object over route 63 just outside batavia, ny maintained a stable position over the road, about 30 ft above the road.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching live cam from blue hill observatory and saw ufos. i saved the pictures. if you need any moe information, email me.

http://www.Hazecam.Net/bluehill.Html
content.summary: Live cam pic's showing ufos

content.detailedDescription: I'm on my back porch very often in the mornings and have been at this location for 4 years.  normal air traffic consist of low flying helicopters from fort hood and an occasional plane on landing pattern for airport at killeen, tx.  the air space around my area is restricted because of the fort hood military base and george bush's ranch down the road so normally only military craft are in the location where i saw this event.  the sun was coming up but it was still dark enough to see a few stars, expesially the bright star in the east.   something extremely bright was traveling from north west of me toward the south east at a strange pace.  due to the brightness and speed of the object, it made it hard for me to determine what type of craft it was. i never heard any sounds that one would normally hear when air traffic is around.  i knew it was out of the ordinary at first but when it completely disappeared, i knew something was different.  after about one minute of watching this object, it vanished.  i searched the sky for another few minutes in the direction it was heading without successfully locating it again.
content.summary: Light brighter than the north star traveling slowly in restricted air space.

content.detailedDescription:
I have written to this site a couple of time describing the encounters that i have had with other-worldly beings and since my last sighting i have seen nothing.
to touch on my first encounter again, the first time i encountered an unexplained being i remember being brought aboard their craft. many years later i noticed an object in my bottom lip that felt hard to the touch. years after that, my dentist noticed the object in an x-ray and was later unable to identify the object.
last night's incident was unbelievable, even by my standards.
i was asleep monday night at about 10:30 p.M. in my living room. i awoke at around 2:00 a.M. to move to my bedroom. then i seem to have a dream of standing in front of a crowd of people and teaching them something i cannot remember. then i awoke on the floor of my room late for work, disoriented, and wet.
the strangest thing is that my mother who sleeps across the hall from me had a similar dream and woke up in the same manner.
whether or not people in this world believe in such circumstances is something left up to the mind of the individual, however i have gone through a life of encounters. i have proof hidden in my lower lip. 
i was told and taught something, i just wish i could remember what.
there is no memory of an object or beings, only the strange environment and the lapse in time. i felt at peace. i was happy. i was a leader in this group. the truth will come out. i am tired of forgetting these events!
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: The time wa between 2116 and 2122 pst on 27 october 2009.  i was driving on 10th street heading south right at the camp roberts boarder.  i saw a redish orange firey ball standing in the sky about 40 degrees westwardly off the road (ssw), and an elevation about 25d.  it seemed to hover there for the duration of the time, not moving closer or backward and not adjusting in intensity.  it was twice as bright as venus and a little larger.  i could trace a straight line between venus and the brightest star in the sky pointing to it with equa-distant intervles (probably no help).  i took a few quick snap shots with my camera, brief video, and test a friend in the town south of me to try and get a tringulation of the thing; while i smoked my ciggorette.  my friend didn't get out to see it fast enough.  after i jumped back in my car it was gone.  i have watched a bunch of rocket launches from vandenburg afb (this was brighter, and didn't move).  and i am in the satellite communications field (not a satellite).  i have been an airplane and ufo fenatic sense i was a kid, and have actually begun to get my piolets license with pigs can fly.  one of my hobbys is stargasing (so was my dads) so i'm farmiliar with some of the random sights that people claim to be ufos.  i could not explain what i saw and would like to get the info e-mail to me if anyone else saw it.  thank you
content.summary: Fireball ssw of san miguel, ca
